event.title: the early 1900s, Arlington, which was then called "Lost Grove", was experiencing

data.event: In the early 1900s, Arlington, which was then called "Lost Grove", was experiencing rapid growth and development.

event.title: November 13, 1909, a fire in a mine shaft killed

data.event: On November 13, 1909, a fire in a mine shaft killed 259 miners, young and old, at the Cherry coal mine.
When the mine was opened a week later only twenty men had survived of the hundreds involved.
The 1909 Cherry Mine disaster influenced early workers' compensation laws and labor practices in the coal mining industry.
